
``extend_vector``
=====================

extend_vector

Description
-----------

extend the range of a vector by a given ratio

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   extend_vector(x, extend_ratio)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``x``
     - x
   * - ``extend_ratio``
     - extend_ratio
